attributes.action: Save Alexandra Hospital Delivery Suite and Antenatal Care
attributes.additional_details: It has been reported that it is likely that the delivery suite will close at the Redditch Alexandra hospital. All patients would then be sent to Worcester/Birmingham. My wife just got transferred from Worcester to Redditch to give birth due to lack of space. This closure doesn't make any sense than to save money and risk lives. My wife received exemplary care from all involved at the delivery suite in the Alexandra hospital.
